channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Freedom And Authority
channel.desc: The last episode of this series wraps up the definitions of freedom and authority, their uses and abuses, and how it is all ordered in God's plan for us. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Saint Kateri Tekakwitha: A Pilgrimage Into Her Heart
channel.desc: Stories of St. Kateri, a miraculous healing and her 2012 canonization---with members of every Indian nation present, are intertwined portraying her as a model of the New Evangelization and a call for all people to treat God?s creation responsibly. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Our Lady Of Mount Carmel Special
channel.desc: Fr. Pablo Straub offers meditations about Our Lady of Mount Carmel. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Fathers For Good
channel.desc: Fr. Francis Gustilo and Frank Padilla explore the spiritual role that fathers play in the lives of their families and society. Following the example of Christ, men are called to love without measure. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Chaplet Of Divine Mercy
channel.desc: From the chapel of the National Shrine of the Divine Mercy in Stockbridge, Massachusetts. (20 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Reflections With Fr. Leo Clifford
channel.desc: Father Leo Clifford reflects on the difference between blind duty and sacrificial love. (10 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Catholic Sphere
channel.desc: Every week a different host brings on a panel of 3 experts to tackle topics on the minds of Catholics. From theology to social media, from young parents to the universal church, surround yourself with solid answers as you enter the Catholic Sphere! (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: A Journey To Mount Carmel
channel.desc: Fr. Kirby declares Jesus Christ is Lord! He offers apostolic and biblical witnesses to illustrate what it means to live for Jesus, and make it a personal decision in our own lives. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Adventure Catechism
channel.desc: Children receive an inspirational and instructive presentation about how the Eucharist came to be instituted, why the Mass is important, and what happens as we celebrate it, both in the visible and the invisible. (15 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Lukas Storyteller
channel.desc: Tired and bored from always playing the same game, Anna suddenly finds herself at the sunken Noah?s ark. Lukas tells her a wonderful story about Pope John Paul II who was once a child and enjoyed playing like she did. (15 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: International Children?s Rosary
channel.desc: Follow along with the Luminous Mysteries led by members of the Children's Rosary prayer group movement. (30 minutes).

channel.desc: The Franciscan Missionaries of the Eternal Word celebrate Mass from the Our Lady of Angels Chapel in Irondale, AL. (LIVE DAILY at 8 am Eastern). (60 minutes).

channel.desc: Rob and Lisa Wahl share effective ways to practice the faith with children and specific ways in which spouses can work together in this particular work of evangelization. (60 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Rosary In French
channel.desc: The Baptism of Christ, Wedding at Cana, Proclamation of the Kingdom, Transfiguration and Institution of the Eucharist help us to receive the graces of salvation from Christ through Mary's intercession. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Grab Your Catechism With Fr. Connor
channel.desc: An in-depth look at the moral obligations the Ten Commandments place on our relationship with God and our fellow men. Hosted by Fr. Charles Connor. (30 minutes).

channel.desc: Rob and Lisa Wahl share effective ways to practice the faith with children and specific ways in which spouses can work together in this particular work of evangelization. (60 minutes).

channel.desc: Fr. Kirby explains the biblical teachings on the Holy Spirit. At Pentecost, we?re called to welcome the Holy Spirit into our lives, and to obey his holy promptings and inspiration. (30 minutes).

channel.desc: EWTN News Nightly is our daily news and analysis program presenting breaking Catholic News worldwide, top stories, and daily reports from the White House, Capitol Hill, and Rome. Weekdays at 6 & 9 PM EST. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Brazil: ?querida Amazonia?
channel.desc: Father Piotr Schewior is a Polish missionary priest who has worked in the heart of the Brazilian Amazon jungle for more than 23 years. Hear the four major challenges that he encounters in these isolated communities. (30 minutes).

channel.desc: Each week, Raymond Arroyo challenges viewers with important political and cultural reporting and analysis of a wide variety of topics of interest to Catholics and people of faith. (60 minutes).

channel.title: Living Divine Mercy
channel.desc: Fr. Chris Alar, M.I.C. helps viewers get a better understanding of the Divine Mercy message, and shares powerful, real life examples of people who live Divine Mercy in their every day lives. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: They Might Be Saints Ven. Mary Angeline Teresa McCrory O. Carm
channel.desc: Mary Angeline Teresa McCrory?s life of holiness and service to the elderly poor has led to a groundswell of support for sainthood. Michael O?Neill looks at Mother McCrory's legacy and the miracles attributed to her. (30 minutes).

channel.desc: Join the Franciscan Missionaries of the Eternal Word at the Shrine of the Most Blessed Sacrament in Hanceville, Alabama, as they recite this beautiful prayer in honor of the Precious Blood of Jesus shed for our salvation. (12 minutes).

channel.title: Called To Communion With Dr. David Anders

channel.desc: Every week, Abigail Galv?n and a team of pro-life experts shine the light of truth on abortion, euthanasia, assisted suicide, and the culture of death. (30 minutes).

channel.title: Walking Through Time: Catholic London
channel.desc: Joanna walks to Chelsea in the footsteps of St. Thomas More, where his country house was located and his old mulberry tree still flourishes on the grounds of what is today a Catholic seminary. (30 minutes).

channel.desc: From the Basilica of Saint Mary Major in Rome, Dr. Jacqueline Leary-Warsaw hosts the sacred musical performance of Bach, Vivaldi, and Handel under the direction of Ildebrando Mura. (60 minutes).

channel.title: Life Is Worth Living
channel.desc: Archbishop Sheen comments that there aren't any new things happening in the world, just the same old things happening to new people. (30 minutes).

channel.title: Stations Of The Cross
channel.desc: Using St. Alphonsus Liguori's Prayers as a guide, pray the traditional Stations of the Cross aiding your meditation with live-action images from Christ's Passion. (30 minutes).
